trans-unit.source: Provides an interface to add and remove the event handlers for events that add, change, remove or rename components, and provides methods to raise a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged"></xref> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma interface para adicionar e remover os manipuladores de eventos para eventos que adicionar, alterarem, remover ou renomear componentes e fornece métodos para gerar um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: IComponentChangeService provides an interface that can be used to indicate the methods that handle the following events: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, raised when a component is added.
trans-unit.target: IComponentChangeService fornece uma interface que pode ser usada para indicar os métodos que lidam com os seguintes eventos:- <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, gerado quando um componente é adicionado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding>, raised when a component is about to be added.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding>, gerado quando um componente está prestes a ser adicionado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdding>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>, raised when a component is changed.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>, gerado quando um componente é alterado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>, raised when a component is about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>, gerado quando um componente está prestes a ser alterado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>, raised when a component is removed.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>, gerado quando um componente é removido.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, raised when a component is about to be removed.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, gerado quando um componente está prestes a ser removido.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRename>, raised when a component is renamed.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRename>, gerado quando um componente é renomeado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRename>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the design environment raises these component add, change, remove, or rename events.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o ambiente de design gera adicionar esses componentes, alterar, remover ou renomear os eventos.

trans-unit.source: Designers should call the methods of this interface when using <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction> objects to provide undo and redo functionality for design-time actions that affect components.
trans-unit.target: Designers devem chamar os métodos desta interface ao usar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>objetos para fornecer desfazer e refazer a funcionalidade para ações de tempo de design que afetam componentes.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>

trans-unit.source: More information is available in the documentation for <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>.
trans-unit.target: Mais informações estão disponíveis na documentação do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>

trans-unit.source: Generally, only the root designer handles these change notifications.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, somente o designer raiz manipula essas notificações de alteração.

trans-unit.source: This service also provides methods that raise a component changed event or component changing event.
trans-unit.target: Esse serviço também fornece métodos que geram um evento de componente alterado ou o evento de alteração de componente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> or a component can indicate that a component has changed or is changing with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanged%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanging%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>ou um componente pode indicar que um componente foi alterado ou está sendo alterado com o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanged%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanging%2A>métodos, respectivamente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanging%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a component has been added.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um componente foi adicionado.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs during load and when new components are created by the user, after the component has been sited.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre durante o carregamento e quando novos componentes são criados pelo usuário, depois que o componente foi localizado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a component is in the process of being added.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um componente está sendo adicionado.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs during load and when the user creates a new component.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre durante o carregamento e quando o usuário cria um novo componente.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the process of adding a component by throwing an exception here.
trans-unit.target: Você pode cancelar o processo de adicionar um componente lançando uma exceção aqui.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a component has been changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um componente é alterado.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when any component on the form changes.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando qualquer componente do formulário é alterado.

trans-unit.source: This event will not occur during form load and unload, because changes are expected at this time.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não será ocorrer durante o formulário carregar e descarregar, porque as alterações são esperadas neste momento.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction> can raise multiple ComponentChanged events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>pode gerar vários eventos de ComponentChanged.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>

trans-unit.source: Some ComponentChanged event handlers can interfere with expected sequences of events, such as if your code alters the values of properties while a transaction is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Alguns manipuladores de eventos ComponentChanged podem interferir com esperado sequências de eventos, por exemplo, se seu código altera os valores das propriedades enquanto uma transação está ocorrendo.

trans-unit.source: A ComponentChanged event handler can also impair performance if it draws after each change while a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction> is in progress.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos ComponentChanged também pode prejudicar o desempenho se desenha após cada alteração durante um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>está em andamento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>

trans-unit.source: In order to allow a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction> in process to complete without interruption or interference by your ComponentChanged event handler, you can test the state of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.InTransaction%2A> property, and defer handling the change events until the completion of the transaction by adding a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventHandler> which will raise your ComponentChanged event handler and remove itself upon completion of the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Para permitir que um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>no processo ser concluído sem interrupção ou interferência por seu manipulador de eventos ComponentChanged, você pode testar o estado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.InTransaction%2A>propriedade e adiar a manipulação de eventos de alteração até a conclusão da transação adicionando um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventHandler>que irá gerar o manipulador de eventos ComponentChanged e remover a mesmo após a conclusão da transação.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransactionCloseEventHandler> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.InTransaction%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerTransaction>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a component is in the process of being changed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um componente está sendo alterado.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs before the component is actually changed, and gives the designer a chance to abort the change or perform any pre-change processing.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre antes do componente é realmente alterado e fornece o designer a oportunidade de cancelar a alteração ou executar qualquer pré-alteração de processamento.

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur during form load and unload, because changes are expected at this time.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento não ocorrer durante o formulário carregar e descarregar, porque as alterações são esperadas neste momento.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a component has been removed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um componente foi removido.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs during unload and when a component is deleted by the user.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre durante a descarregar e quando um componente é excluído pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: The event occurs before the site has been removed from the component.
trans-unit.target: O evento ocorre antes do site foi removido do componente.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a component is in the process of being removed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um componente está sendo removido.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs during unload and when the user deletes a component.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre durante a descarregar e quando o usuário exclui um componente.

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the process of removing a component by throwing an exception here.
trans-unit.target: Você pode cancelar o processo de remoção de um componente lançando uma exceção aqui.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a component is renamed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um componente é renomeado.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event when a component has been renamed.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre após o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>evento quando um componente foi renomeado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Announces to the component change service that a particular component has changed.
trans-unit.target: Anuncia para o serviço de alteração de componente que um componente específico foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>evento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Most designers that ship with the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)], as well as the Visual Studio design-time environment, typically raise this event for you when a component in a project is changed, so most of the time you do not need to explicitly call this method.
trans-unit.target: A maioria dos designers que acompanham o [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)], bem como o ambiente de tempo de design do Visual Studio, normalmente gerar esse evento para você quando um componente em um projeto for alterada, na maioria das vezes, você não precisa explicitamente chamar este método.

trans-unit.source: The appropriate <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> events are automatically raised when a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> is used to change a property value or components are added or removed from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> container.
trans-unit.target: Apropriada <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>eventos são automaticamente gerado quando um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>é usado para alterar uma propriedade de valor ou componentes são adicionados ou removidos do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>contêiner.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>

trans-unit.source: Before calling OnComponentChanged, first call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanging%2A> to indicate that a component is about to change, and make the change.
trans-unit.target: Antes de chamar OnComponentChanged, primeiro chame <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanging%2A>para indicar que um componente está prestes a alterar e fazer a alteração.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.OnComponentChanging%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then call OnComponentChanged to raise the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, chamar OnComponentChanged para gerar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>evento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: The component that has changed.
trans-unit.target: O componente que foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The member that has changed.
trans-unit.target: O membro que foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: This is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this change is not related to a single member.
trans-unit.target: Isso é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se essa alteração não está relacionada a um único membro.

trans-unit.source: The old value of the member.
trans-unit.target: O valor antigo do membro.

trans-unit.source: This is valid only if the member is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é válido somente se o membro não for <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the member.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor do membro.

trans-unit.source: This is valid only if the member is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é válido somente se o membro não for <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Announces to the component change service that a particular component is changing.
trans-unit.target: Anuncia para o serviço de alteração de componente que um componente específico está sendo alterado.

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: Este método gera o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>evento.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>

trans-unit.source: Most designers included with the [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)], as well as the Visual Studio design-time environment, typically raise this event automatically; so most of the time, you do not need to explicitly call this method.
trans-unit.target: A maioria dos designers incluídos com o [!INCLUDE[winsdklong](~/add/includes/winsdklong-md.md)], bem como o ambiente de tempo de design do Visual Studio, normalmente gerar este evento automaticamente; assim a maioria das vezes, você não precisa explicitamente chamar este método.

trans-unit.source: The appropriate <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> events are automatically raised when a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> is used to change a property value or components are added or removed from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> container.
trans-unit.target: Apropriada <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>eventos são automaticamente gerado quando um <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>é usado para alterar uma propriedade de valor ou componentes são adicionados ou removidos do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>contêiner.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>

trans-unit.source: The component that is about to change.
trans-unit.target: O componente que está prestes a ser alterada.

trans-unit.source: The member that is changing.
trans-unit.target: O membro que está sendo alterado.

trans-unit.source: This is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this change is not related to a single member.
trans-unit.target: Isso é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se essa alteração não está relacionada a um único membro.
